sentence.Network_en: The matter of the body is continually changing by process of nutriment and wastage.
sentence.Network_cn: 肉体的物质通过营养与消耗的过程不断变化着.

sentence.Network_en: It is ridiculous to judge a foreign culture only by its nutriment.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅仅根据唯一全国的饮食来评价该全国的文学是荒唐可笑的.

sentence.Network_en: Physical and chemical index and the compose of nutriment were analyzed.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果表明:饼皮料的最佳配比以面粉为100%计,豆渣粉15%,木糖醇糖浆80%,亚麻油25%.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin nutrimentum, from nutrire 'feed, nourish'

means.word_mean: 1. a source of materials to nourish the body

auth_sentence.content: It...helps to keep the body warm and serves as a store of nutriment.
